title: Growing Strawberries Treating Pests in your Strawberries

tasks.task: Picking ripe strawberries from a bed.
subtasks: Observe strawberry ripeness ( selecting those just ripe, not too ripe ).
Remove mature strawberries gently ( pulling them up if possible instead of just taking the top part ).
Dispose of overripe strawberries by placing them on the ground ( letting bugs handle them ).
Avoid using pesticides and maintain organic harvesting methods.

tasks.task: Maintaining strawberry beds to prevent bug damage.
subtasks: Regularly check strawberry beds for sow bugs and other insects.
Pick strawberries daily before they become overripe and attract pests.
Keep strawberries off the ground ( by pulling up strawberry plants or arranging them properly ).
